data: Across the narrow gorge the little foot-bridge stretched-a brace of logs, the upper surface hewn, and a slight hand-rail formed of a cedar pole.
Craddock, Charles Egbert, 1850-1922; Frost, A. B. (Arthur Burdett), 1851-1928 [Illustrator]
